description.short: Find art in the Rijkmuseum digital archive.
description.full: Find art in the Rijksmuseum digital archive by searching on name of the art, creator or timeperiod.

commands.description: Find art available in the Rijksmuseum using the art title
commands.title: Find art in using the title
commands.semanticDescription: This command retrieves detailed information about art objects which can are available in the Rijksmuseum using the provided art title or artist which did created the art object.

samplePrompts.text: What art objects created by Rembrandt van Rijn can be seen in the Rijksmuseum
Can you find more information about De Nachtwacht which can be seen in the Rijksmuseum
Which art objects created in the 21st century can be seen in the Rijksmuseum
Which art objects of the type schilderij can be seen in the Rijksmuseum

parameters.name: ObjectTitle
parameters.title: Object Title
parameters.description: The title of the piece of art or object to be searched
parameters.semanticDescription: This parameter is used to identify the specific art object to be queried. Users should provide the exact name of the art object they want to retrieve information for as the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: Artist
parameters.title: Artist
parameters.description: Artist or maker of the art or object
parameters.semanticDescription: This parameter is used to identify which art objects a specific artist did create. Users should provide the name of the artist from which they want to know which art objects the artist did create as the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.title: Type
parameters.description: Type of the art or object
parameters.semanticDescription: This parameter is used to identify which art objects are from a specific type. Users should provide the type of art object they are searching for as the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: Century
parameters.title: Century
parameters.description: The century in which the art or object is created, made
parameters.semanticDescription: This parameter is used to identify which art objects are created in a century. Users should provide the century to search for art objects created in that specific century for as the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: TopPieces
parameters.title: Top pieces
parameters.description: Top pieces of art or object
parameters.semanticDescription: This parameter is used to identify which art objects are belonging to the top pieces of the Rijksmuseum. Users should provide include top pieces as the value of this parameter.
